001package squidpony.squidmath;
002
003import squidpony.annotation.Beta;
004
005import static squidpony.squidmath.ValueNoise.valueNoise;
006
007/**
008 * WIP edit of {@link FoamNoise} that doesn't use domain warping.
009 */
010@Beta
011public class FoalNoise implements Noise.Noise2D, Noise.Noise3D, Noise.Noise4D, Noise.Noise5D, Noise.Noise6D {
012    public static final FoalNoise instance = new FoalNoise();
013
014    public int seed = 0xD1CEBEEF;
015    public double sharpness = 0.75;
016    public FoalNoise() {
017    }
018
019    public FoalNoise(int seed) {
020        this.seed = seed;
021    }
022
023    public FoalNoise(long seed) {
024        this.seed = (int) (seed ^ seed >>> 32);
025    }
026
027    public FoalNoise(long seed, double sharpness) {
028        this(seed);
029        this.sharpness = 0.75 * sharpness;
030        
031    }
032
033    public double foamNoise(final double x, final double y, int seed) {
034        final double p0 = x;
035        final double p1 = x * -0.5 + y * 0.8660254037844386;
036        final double p2 = x * -0.5 + y * -0.8660254037844387;
037
038        double xin = p1;
039        double yin = p2;
040        //double xin = x * 0.540302 + y * 0.841471; // sin and cos of 1
041        //double yin = x * -0.841471 + y * 0.540302;
042        final double a = valueNoise(seed, xin, yin);
043        seed += 0x9E3779BD;
044        seed = (seed ^ seed >>> 12) * 0xDAB;
045        seed ^= seed >>> 14;
046        xin = p2;
047        yin = p0;
048        //xin = x * -0.989992 + y * 0.141120; // sin and cos of 3
049        //yin = x * -0.141120 + y * -0.989992;
050        final double b = valueNoise(seed, xin, yin);
051        seed += 0x9E3779BD;
052        seed = (seed ^ seed >>> 12) * 0xDAB;
053        seed ^= seed >>> 14;
054        xin = p0;
055        yin = p1;
056        //xin = x * 0.283662 + y * -0.958924; // sin and cos of 5
057        //yin = x * 0.958924 + y * 0.283662;
058        final double c = valueNoise(seed, xin, yin);
059        final double result = a * 0.3125 + (b + c) * 0.34375;
060//        return result * result * (6.0 - 4.0 * result) - 1.0;
061//        return (result <= 0.5)
062//                ? (result * result * 4.0) - 1.0
063//                : 1.0 - ((result - 1.0) * (result - 1.0) * 4.0);
064        final double sharp = sharpness * 2.2;
065        final double diff = 0.5 - result;
066        final int sign = NumberTools.doubleToHighIntBits(diff) >> 31, one = sign | 1;
067        return ((( 0.5 * one - sign) * (result + sign)) / (Double.MIN_VALUE - sign + (result + sharp * diff) * one) - sign) * 2.0 - 1.0;
068    }
069    
070    /*
071x * -0.185127 + y * -0.791704 + z * -0.582180;
072x * -0.776796 + y * 0.628752 + z * -0.035464;
073x * 0.822283 + y * 0.467437 + z * -0.324582;
074
075x * 0.139640 + y * -0.304485 + z * 0.942226;
076x * -0.776796 + y * 0.628752 + z * -0.035464;
077x * 0.822283 + y * 0.467437 + z * -0.324582;
078
079x * 0.139640 + y * -0.304485 + z * 0.942226;
080x * -0.185127 + y * -0.791704 + z * -0.582180;
081x * 0.822283 + y * 0.467437 + z * -0.324582;
082
083x * 0.139640 + y * -0.304485 + z * 0.942226;
084x * -0.185127 + y * -0.791704 + z * -0.582180;
085x * -0.776796 + y * 0.628752 + z * -0.035464;
086     */
087
088
089    public double foamNoise(final double x, final double y, final double z, int seed) {
090        final double p0 = x;
091        final double p1 = x * -0.3333333333333333 + y * 0.9428090415820634;
092        final double p2 = x * -0.3333333333333333 + y * -0.4714045207910317 + z * 0.816496580927726;
093        final double p3 = x * -0.3333333333333333 + y * -0.4714045207910317 + z * -0.816496580927726;
094
095        //final double p0 = (x + y + z);// * 0.5;
096        //final double p1 = x - (y + z);// * 0.25;
097        //final double p2 = y - (x + z);// * 0.25;
098        //final double p3 = z - (x + y);// * 0.25;
099////rotated version of above points on a tetrahedron; the ones below are "more correct" but more complex (and slower?)       
100//        final double p0 = x * 0.139640 + y * -0.304485 + z * 0.942226;
101//        final double p1 = x * -0.185127 + y * -0.791704 + z * -0.582180;
102//        final double p2 = x * -0.776796 + y * 0.628752 + z * -0.035464;
103//        final double p3 = x * 0.822283 + y * 0.467437 + z * -0.324582;
104        double xin = p1;
105        double yin = p2;
106        double zin = p3;
107        final double a = valueNoise(seed, xin, yin, zin);
108        //seed = (seed ^ 0x9E3779BD) * 0xDAB;
109        seed += 0x9E3779BD;
110        seed = (seed ^ seed >>> 12) * 0xDAB;
111        seed ^= seed >>> 14;
112        xin = p0;
113        yin = p2;
114        zin = p3;
115        final double b = valueNoise(seed, xin, yin, zin);
116        //seed = (seed ^ 0x9E3779BD) * 0xDAB;
117        seed += 0x9E3779BD;
118        seed = (seed ^ seed >>> 12) * 0xDAB;
119        seed ^= seed >>> 14;
120        xin = p0;
121        yin = p1;
122        zin = p3;
123        final double c = valueNoise(seed, xin, yin, zin);
124        //seed = (seed ^ 0x9E3779BD) * 0xDAB;
125        seed += 0x9E3779BD;
126        seed = (seed ^ seed >>> 12) * 0xDAB;
127        seed ^= seed >>> 14;
128        xin = p0;
129        yin = p1;
130        zin = p2;
131        final double d = valueNoise(seed, xin, yin, zin);
132
133        final double result = (a + b + c + d) * 0.25;
134//        return  (result * result * (6.0 - 4.0 * result) - 1.0);
135//        return (result <= 0.5)
136//                ? Math.pow(result * 2, 3.0) - 1.0
137//                : Math.pow((result - 1) * 2, 3.0) + 1.0;
138        final double sharp = sharpness * 3.3;
139        final double diff = 0.5 - result;
140        final int sign = NumberTools.doubleToHighIntBits(diff) >> 31, one = sign | 1;
141        return ((( 0.5 * one - sign) * (result + sign)) / (Double.MIN_VALUE - sign + (result + sharp * diff) * one) - sign) * 2.0 - 1.0;
142
143    }
144
145    public double foamNoise(final double x, final double y, final double z, final double w, int seed) {
146        final double p0 = x;
147        final double p1 = x * -0.25 + y * 0.9682458365518543;
148        final double p2 = x * -0.25 + y * -0.3227486121839514 + z * 0.9128709291752769;
149        final double p3 = x * -0.25 + y * -0.3227486121839514 + z * -0.45643546458763834 + w * 0.7905694150420949;
150        final double p4 = x * -0.25 + y * -0.3227486121839514 + z * -0.45643546458763834 + w * -0.7905694150420947;
151////orthogonal 5-cell, like a right triangle; probably incorrect
152        //final double p0 = (x + y + z + w);
153        //final double p1 = x - (y + z + w);
154        //final double p2 = y - (x + z + w);
155        //final double p3 = z - (x + y + w);
156        //final double p4 = w - (x + y + z);
157////rotated version of above points on a 5-cell; the ones below are "more correct" but more complex (and slower?)       
158//        final double p0 = x * 0.139640 + y * -0.304485 + z * 0.942226;
159//        final double p1 = x * -0.185127 + y * -0.791704 + z * -0.582180;
160//        final double p2 = x * -0.776796 + y * 0.628752 + z * -0.035464;
161//        final double p3 = x * 0.822283 + y * 0.467437 + z * -0.324582;
162        double xin = p1;
163        double yin = p2;
164        double zin = p3;
165        double win = p4;
166        final double a = valueNoise(seed, xin, yin, zin, win);
167        //seed = (seed ^ 0x9E3779BD) * 0xDAB;
168        seed += 0x9E3779BD;
169        seed = (seed ^ seed >>> 12) * 0xDAB;
170        seed ^= seed >>> 14;
171        xin = p0;
172        yin = p2;
173        zin = p3;
174        win = p4;
175        final double b = valueNoise(seed, xin, yin, zin, win);
176        //seed = (seed ^ 0x9E3779BD) * 0xDAB;
177        seed += 0x9E3779BD;
178        seed = (seed ^ seed >>> 12) * 0xDAB;
179        seed ^= seed >>> 14;
180        xin = p0;
181        yin = p1;
182        zin = p3;
183        win = p4;
184        final double c = valueNoise(seed, xin, yin, zin, win);
185        //seed = (seed ^ 0x9E3779BD) * 0xDAB;
186        seed += 0x9E3779BD;
187        seed = (seed ^ seed >>> 12) * 0xDAB;
188        seed ^= seed >>> 14;
189        xin = p0;
190        yin = p1;
191        zin = p2;
192        win = p4;
193        final double d = valueNoise(seed, xin, yin, zin, win);
194        seed += 0x9E3779BD;
195        seed = (seed ^ seed >>> 12) * 0xDAB;
196        seed ^= seed >>> 14;
197        xin = p0;
198        yin = p1;
199        zin = p2;
200        win = p3;
201        final double e = valueNoise(seed, xin, yin, zin, win);
202
203        final double result = (a + b + c + d + e) * 0.2;
204//        return (result <= 0.5)
205//                ? Math.pow(result * 2, 4.0) - 1.0
206//                : 1.0 - Math.pow((result - 1) * 2, 4.0);
207//        return  (result * result * (6.0 - 4.0 * result) - 1.0);
208        final double sharp = sharpness * 4.4;
209        final double diff = 0.5 - result;
210        final int sign = NumberTools.doubleToHighIntBits(diff) >> 31, one = sign | 1;
211        return ((( 0.5 * one - sign) * (result + sign)) / (Double.MIN_VALUE - sign + (result + sharp * diff) * one) - sign) * 2.0 - 1.0;
212    }
213    public double foamNoise(final double x, final double y, final double z,
214                                   final double w, final double u, int seed) {
215        final double p0 = x * 0.8157559148337911 + y * 0.5797766823136037;
216        final double p1 = x * -0.7314923478726791 + y * 0.6832997137249108;
217        final double p2 = x * -0.0208603044412437 + y * -0.3155296974329846 + z * 0.9486832980505138;
218        final double p3 = x * -0.0208603044412437 + y * -0.3155296974329846 + z * -0.316227766016838 + w * 0.8944271909999159;
219        final double p4 = x * -0.0208603044412437 + y * -0.3155296974329846 + z * -0.316227766016838 + w * -0.44721359549995804 + u * 0.7745966692414833;
220        final double p5 = x * -0.0208603044412437 + y * -0.3155296974329846 + z * -0.316227766016838 + w * -0.44721359549995804 + u * -0.7745966692414836;
221
222        double xin = p1;
223        double yin = p2;
224        double zin = p3;
225        double win = p4;
226        double uin = p5;
227        final double a = valueNoise(seed, xin, yin, zin, win, uin);
228        seed += 0x9E3779BD;
229        seed = (seed ^ seed >>> 12) * 0xDAB;
230        seed ^= seed >>> 14;
231        xin = p0;
232        yin = p2;
233        zin = p3;
234        win = p4;
235        uin = p5;
236        final double b = valueNoise(seed, xin, yin, zin, win, uin);
237        seed += 0x9E3779BD;
238        seed = (seed ^ seed >>> 12) * 0xDAB;
239        seed ^= seed >>> 14;
240        xin = p0;
241        yin = p1;
242        zin = p3;
243        win = p4;
244        uin = p5;
245        final double c = valueNoise(seed, xin, yin, zin, win, uin);
246        seed += 0x9E3779BD;
247        seed = (seed ^ seed >>> 12) * 0xDAB;
248        seed ^= seed >>> 14;
249        xin = p0;
250        yin = p1;
251        zin = p2;
252        win = p4;
253        uin = p5;
254        final double d = valueNoise(seed, xin, yin, zin, win, uin);
255        seed += 0x9E3779BD;
256        seed = (seed ^ seed >>> 12) * 0xDAB;
257        seed ^= seed >>> 14;
258        xin = p0;
259        yin = p1;
260        zin = p2;
261        win = p3;
262        uin = p5;
263        final double e = valueNoise(seed, xin, yin, zin, win, uin);
264        seed += 0x9E3779BD;
265        seed = (seed ^ seed >>> 12) * 0xDAB;
266        seed ^= seed >>> 14;
267        xin = p0;
268        yin = p1;
269        zin = p2;
270        win = p3;
271        uin = p4;
272        final double f = valueNoise(seed, xin, yin, zin, win, uin);
273
274        final double result = (a + b + c + d + e + f) * 0.16666666666666666;
275//        return (result <= 0.5)
276//                ? 32.0 * result * result * result * result * result - 1.0
277//                : 32.0 * (result - 1) * (result - 1) * (result - 1) * (result - 1) * (result - 1) + 1.0;
278        final double sharp = sharpness * 5.5;
279        final double diff = 0.5 - result;
280        final int sign = NumberTools.doubleToHighIntBits(diff) >> 31, one = sign | 1;
281        return ((( 0.5 * one - sign) * (result + sign)) / (Double.MIN_VALUE - sign + (result + sharp * diff) * one) - sign) * 2.0 - 1.0;
282    }
283
284    public double foamNoise(final double x, final double y, final double z,
285                                   final double w, final double u, final double v, int seed) {
286        final double p0 = x;
287        final double p1 = x * -0.16666666666666666 + y * 0.9860132971832694;
288        final double p2 = x * -0.16666666666666666 + y * -0.19720265943665383 + z * 0.9660917830792959;
289        final double p3 = x * -0.16666666666666666 + y * -0.19720265943665383 + z * -0.24152294576982394 + w * 0.9354143466934853;
290        final double p4 = x * -0.16666666666666666 + y * -0.19720265943665383 + z * -0.24152294576982394 + w * -0.31180478223116176 + u * 0.8819171036881969;
291        final double p5 = x * -0.16666666666666666 + y * -0.19720265943665383 + z * -0.24152294576982394 + w * -0.31180478223116176 + u * -0.4409585518440984 + v * 0.7637626158259734;
292        final double p6 = x * -0.16666666666666666 + y * -0.19720265943665383 + z * -0.24152294576982394 + w * -0.31180478223116176 + u * -0.4409585518440984 + v * -0.7637626158259732;
293        double xin = p1;
294        double yin = p2;
295        double zin = p3;
296        double win = p4;
297        double uin = p5;
298        double vin = p6;
299        final double a = valueNoise(seed, xin, yin, zin, win, uin, vin);
300        seed += 0x9E3779BD;
301        seed = (seed ^ seed >>> 12) * 0xDAB;
302        seed ^= seed >>> 14;
303        xin = p0;
304        yin = p2;
305        zin = p3;
306        win = p4;
307        uin = p5;
308        vin = p6;
309        final double b = valueNoise(seed, xin, yin, zin, win, uin, vin);
310        seed += 0x9E3779BD;
311        seed = (seed ^ seed >>> 12) * 0xDAB;
312        seed ^= seed >>> 14;
313        xin = p0;
314        yin = p1;
315        zin = p3;
316        win = p4;
317        uin = p5;
318        vin = p6;
319        final double c = valueNoise(seed, xin, yin, zin, win, uin, vin);
320        seed += 0x9E3779BD;
321        seed = (seed ^ seed >>> 12) * 0xDAB;
322        seed ^= seed >>> 14;
323        xin = p0;
324        yin = p1;
325        zin = p2;
326        win = p4;
327        uin = p5;
328        vin = p6;
329        final double d = valueNoise(seed, xin, yin, zin, win, uin, vin);
330        seed += 0x9E3779BD;
331        seed = (seed ^ seed >>> 12) * 0xDAB;
332        seed ^= seed >>> 14;
333        xin = p0;
334        yin = p1;
335        zin = p2;
336        win = p3;
337        uin = p5;
338        vin = p6;
339        final double e = valueNoise(seed, xin, yin, zin, win, uin, vin);
340        seed += 0x9E3779BD;
341        seed = (seed ^ seed >>> 12) * 0xDAB;
342        seed ^= seed >>> 14;
343        xin = p0;
344        yin = p1;
345        zin = p2;
346        win = p3;
347        uin = p4;
348        vin = p6;
349        final double f = valueNoise(seed, xin, yin, zin, win, uin, vin);
350        seed += 0x9E3779BD;
351        seed = (seed ^ seed >>> 12) * 0xDAB;
352        seed ^= seed >>> 14;
353        xin = p0;
354        yin = p1;
355        zin = p2;
356        win = p3;
357        uin = p4;
358        vin = p5;
359        final double g = valueNoise(seed, xin, yin, zin, win, uin, vin);
360
361        final double result = (a + b + c + d + e + f + g) * 0.14285714285714285;
362//        return (result <= 0.5)
363//                ? Math.pow(result * 2, 6.0) - 1.0
364//                : 1.0 - Math.pow((result - 1) * 2, 6.0);
365        final double sharp = sharpness * 6.6;
366        final double diff = 0.5 - result;
367        final int sign = NumberTools.doubleToHighIntBits(diff) >> 31, one = sign | 1;
368        return ((( 0.5 * one - sign) * (result + sign)) / (Double.MIN_VALUE - sign + (result + sharp * diff) * one) - sign) * 2.0 - 1.0;
369    }
370
371    @Override
372    public double getNoise(double x, double y) {
373        return foamNoise(x, y, seed);
374    }
375    @Override
376    public double getNoiseWithSeed(double x, double y, long seed) {
377        return foamNoise(x, y, (int) (seed ^ seed >>> 32));
378    }
379    @Override
380    public double getNoise(double x, double y, double z) {
381        return foamNoise(x, y, z, seed);
382    }
383    @Override
384    public double getNoiseWithSeed(double x, double y, double z, long seed) {
385        return foamNoise(x, y, z, (int) (seed ^ seed >>> 32));
386    }
387    @Override
388    public double getNoise(double x, double y, double z, double w) {
389        return foamNoise(x, y, z, w, seed);
390    }
391    @Override
392    public double getNoiseWithSeed(double x, double y, double z, double w, long seed) {
393        return foamNoise(x, y, z, w, (int) (seed ^ seed >>> 32));
394    }
395    @Override
396    public double getNoise(double x, double y, double z, double w, double u) {
397        return foamNoise(x, y, z, w, u, seed);
398    }
399    @Override
400    public double getNoiseWithSeed(double x, double y, double z, double w, double u, long seed) {
401        return foamNoise(x, y, z, w, u, (int) (seed ^ seed >>> 32));
402    }
403    @Override
404    public double getNoise(double x, double y, double z, double w, double u, double v) {
405        return foamNoise(x, y, z, w, u, v, seed);
406    }
407    @Override
408    public double getNoiseWithSeed(double x, double y, double z, double w, double u, double v, long seed) {
409        return foamNoise(x, y, z, w, u, v, (int) (seed ^ seed >>> 32));
410    }
411}
